title: If the land under green belt zone, excepting open space therein, if any, is required by Authority for the public purposes mentioned above, the owner shall hand over the possession of such land for the development and maintenance of public purposes
clause_text: If the land under green belt zone, excepting open space therein, if any, is required by Authority for the public purposes mentioned above, the owner shall hand over the possession of such land for the development and maintenance of public purposes. Thereafter, such land shall remain open and accessible to general public for recreational activities.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
